high_signal_items.title: Explainable Patterns in Cryptocurrency Microstructure
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: The study identifies stable cross-asset patterns in cryptocurrency microstructure, suggesting a portable representation of short-horizon returns. This could lead to the development of universal feature libraries for crypto markets, enhancing trading strategies across different assets.

high_signal_items.title: Generative AI for Stock Selection
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: The use of generative AI to automate feature discovery in stock selection shows significant improvements in Sharpe ratios, indicating potential for AI-driven strategies to outperform traditional methods in equity markets.

high_signal_items.title: Adaptive Benign Overfitting (ABO): Overparameterized RLS for Online Learning in Non-stationary Time-series
high_signal_items.why_it_matters: ABO provides a stable online learning framework that adapts to non-stationary time-series, showing high accuracy in forecasting foreign exchange and electricity demand. This could enhance algorithmic trading strategies in volatile markets.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Stable cross-asset microstructure patterns can be exploited for arbitrage opportunities across different cryptocurrencies.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Develop a trading algorithm based on identified microstructure patterns and backtest on historical data from multiple cryptocurrencies.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Generative AI can discover novel features that improve stock selection and enhance portfolio performance.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Integrate AI-generated features into a stock selection model and evaluate performance against traditional models using historical data.

new_agent_ideas.edge_hypothesis: Adaptive benign overfitting allows for accurate and stable forecasting in non-stationary environments, providing an edge in volatile markets.
new_agent_ideas.test_plan: Implement ABO in a live trading environment and monitor performance against benchmarks in FX and energy markets.

new_data_sources.name: Binance Futures Order Book Data
new_data_sources.use_case: To analyze cross-asset microstructure patterns in cryptocurrency markets.

new_data_sources.name: Analyst Reports and Options Data
new_data_sources.use_case: For feature discovery in stock selection using generative AI.

new_data_sources.name: Foreign Exchange and Electricity Demand Data
new_data_sources.use_case: To test adaptive forecasting models in non-stationary time-series environments.
